saao/saa15/P334539
a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-MEŠ-ka {1}MAN-IGI.LAL-ni {1}MAN-IGI.LAL-ni-ma lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ni ina UGU {URU}bir-te ša LUGAL BE-ni iš-pur-a-na-ši-ni ma-a uṣ-ra har-ri-da x x x x-ia {1}ṣa-la-a.a x x x x-a.a {URU}sa-pi-a.a x x x ina pa-ni-ni i-ti-ti-su x x x ki-i an-ni-e iq-ṭi₂-bu-na-ši x x x x x x x x x x x x x x LUGAL be-li₂-ni x x x x x x lu-bi-lu-u-ni x x x x i-ba-aš₂-ši {GIŠ}GAG.TI-MEŠ x-lim-x-me ina {URU}bir-te i-ba-ši x x x x+x GIR₃.PAD.DU-MEŠ-a.a GID₂.DA x x x x x+x ki-i {GIŠ}GAG.TI-MEŠ x x x x x+x-a-ti nu-še-lu-u-ni
